newsitem.title: CANADA: Canada economy to grow slowly until '97 - group.
newsitem.headline: Canada economy to grow slowly until '97 - group.

text.p: Canada's economy will grow only 1.7 percent this year, but the rate of expansion should pick up to 2.6 percent in 1997, a private research foundation said on Wednesday.

In the summer 1996 issue of its Provincial Outlook, the Conference Board of Canada said it had revised its 1996 growth forecast down slightly from the 1.9 percent it had forecast in its spring Canadian Outlook.
